Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of the of the VOIPResponse that passes the callback into python.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PyVOIPResponse::PyVOIPResponse ( VOIPClient *  voip,
PyObject *  callback 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
voip The VOIPClient the response will be handling callbacks to.
callback A callable python object that accepts an argument list of the form (int, dictionary).

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

void PyVOIPResponse::response ( int  message,
const VOIPDataDict *  data 
) [virtual]

This function passes the callback on to the python function given when the PyVOIPResponce was constructed.

Parameters:
message An integer with a VoIP implementation defined meaning.
data A set of string value pairs that will be passed into the script as a python dictionary.

Implements VOIPResponse.
